content: place it on the left needle remove marker knit that stitch together with the next live stitch on the needle repeat knitting every other cast on stitch together with the next live stitch on the needle to end of round removing markers as above set up round k3 k2tog * k2 k2tog repeat * to last 3 stitches k3 100 stitches lace pattern rounds 1- 39 knit 5 times per round place a stitch marker between repeats 2 crown decreases repeat 5 times per round slipping all markers round 1 k1tbl p1 k6 k2tog k8 k2tog repeat to end of round 90 stitches round 2 k1tbl p1 k16 repeat to end of round round 3 k1tbl p1 k5 k2tog k7 k2tog repeat to end of round 80 stitches round 4 k1tbl p1 k14 repeat to end of round round 5 k1tbl p1 k4 k2tog k6 k2tog repeat to end of round 70 stitches round 6 k1tbl p1 k12 repeat to end of round round 7 k1tbl p1 k3 k2tog k5 k2tog repeat to end of round 60 stitches round 8 k1tbl p1 k10 repeat to end of round round 9 k1tbl p1 k2 k2tog k4 k2tog repeat to end of round 50 stitches round 10 k1tbl p1 k8 repeat to end of round round 11 k1tbl p1 k1 k2tog k3 k2tog repeat to end of round 40 stitches round 12 k1tbl p1 k6 repeat to end of round round 13 k1tbl p1 k2tog k2 k2tog repeat to end of round 30 stitches round 14 k1tbl p1 k4 repeat to end of round round 15 k1tbl k2tog k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 20 stitches round 16 k1tbl k3 repeat to end of round round 17 k2tog k2tog rm repeat to end of round 10 stitches round 18 k2tog repeat to end of round 5 stitches finishing break yarn leaving an 8 tail with a tapestry needle thread through remaining 5 stitches and pull taut weave in ends block and enjoy this cloche has a lot of stretch so upon completion try it on to check the fit then wet block and dry over a balloon i typically inflate the balloon a little smaller than the desired circumference to allow the lace to open up to the perfect size 3 lace chart work chart from bottom to top each row is worked from right to left and 5 times per round 4 chart instructions repeat each row 5 times per round row 1 k1tbl p x 1 k x 16 k1tbl p x 1 row 2 k1tbl p x 1 k x 11 yo k x 1 yo k x 1 sk2p k1tbl p x 1 row 3 k1tbl p x 1 k x 16 k1tbl p x 1 row 4 k1tbl p x 1 k x 10 yo k x 1 yo k x 2 sk2p k1tbl p x 1 row 5 k1tbl p x 1 k x 16 k1tbl p x 1 row 6 k1tbl p x 1
